data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My dad wants to paint the house this weekend. He ____ a ____ paint ____. I don't like ____ houses, and ____ mother ____ does ____ like ____. The ____ paint ____ not ____ nice! But he will do all the painting, and he chose the color.
data.partBlankContent: My dad wants to paint the house this weekend. He ch___ a gr___ paint co___. I don't like gr___ houses, and m_ mother al__ does n__ like th__. The gr___ paint i_ not ve__ nice! But he will do all the painting, and he chose the color.
data.fullContent: My dad wants to paint the house this weekend. He chose a green paint color. I don't like green houses, and my mother also does not like that. The green paint is not very nice! But he will do all the painting, and he chose the color.
data.answer: 我爸爸这个周末想油漆房子。他选择了绿色的油漆颜色。我不喜欢绿色的房子，我妈妈也不喜欢。绿色的油漆不是很好!但他会做所有的油漆工作，他选择了颜色。
